description.value:
Trigger You fail or critically fail a saving throw against an effect that has the morph, poison, or polymorph trait, or that would make you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Doomed], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Petrified], or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened].

Your body's perfection keeps you just a little bit healthier than most. You get a failure if you rolled a critical failure or a success if you rolled a failure.
